title: Report: Sepp Kuss Extends Contract Until 2027 with Visma-Lease a Bike
content:
Dutch website Wielerflits reports that the American star, Jonas Vingegaard, and Fem van Empel all extend contracts to stay at Visma-Lease a Bike.

Read the full article at Report: Sepp Kuss Extends Contract Until 2027 with Visma-Lease a Bike on Velo.
author: ahood
